mapper.insert: insert into post_like_tb select iv.post_like_id, iv.post_id, iv.user_id, iv.created_at from (select 0 as post_like_id, #{postId} as post_id, #{userId} as user_id, now() as created_at) iv left outer join post_like_tb plt on(plt.post_id = iv.post_id and plt.user_id = iv.user_id) where plt.post_like_id is null
mapper.select: select post_id, count(post_id) as like_count from post_like_tb where post_id = #{postId} group by post_id
select post_id, count(post_id) as like_count from post_like_tb group by post_id
